explanation: [0-0] On a sunny soccer field, a man and a woman in black jerseys are taking on a fun challenge. The woman stands in front of a white line with her hands clasped, smiling. The man squats behind her, holding a large blue ball, ready to start the challenge. Their names are displayed above on the screen.

[0-2] The man pushes the ball towards the woman, who steadily sits on the large blue ball and maintains her balance. After sitting firmly, a ball symbol appears below the woman's name. She then gives a double thumbs-up to the camera with a confident smile.
